title: Wrapped Walk Ways, Project for Jacob L. Loose Memorial Park, Kansas City, Missouri [left panel]
medium: left panel of two parts: collage with two photographs by Wolfgang Volz, fabric sample, graphite, and staples on paperboard
dimensions:

creditline: Gift of a Private Collector in honor of Dorothy and Herbert Vogel
